Item.text: Select all data in a file

Enumeration.description: Command: Go to start (selection details window)

Item.text: Navigate to the start of selected block

Enumeration.description: Command: Go to end (selection details window)

Item.text: Navigate to the end of selected block
Specify data range and combine it with a current selection
Load new selection or combine it with a current one
Save the current selection to a file
Jump to next non-sparse data region in a document
Jump to previous non-sparse data region in a document
Turn the Insert mode on or off
Find pattern or all pattern occurrences
Select all existing data in a document (skipping gaps)
Fill selection with byte or pattern
Go to the specific offset in file
Change the size of the file
Insert the contents of the disk file to the current position. Either puts or inserts data, depending on the current overwrite mode
Choose one of the recent patterns
Show or hide a text (ASCII or UNICODE) pane
Automatically calculate the number of columns
Show or hide a code pane
Toggle Single Selection mode on or off
Perform a set minimum value operation
Perform a set maximum value operation
Perform a logical left shift operation
Perform a logical right shift operation
Perform an arithmetic left shift operation
Perform an arithmetic right shift operation
Perform a rotate left shift operation
Perform a rotate right shift operation
Refresh the current window (for disk, process and memory)
Copy the list of selection regions to the Clipboard
Export the list of selection regions to the file
Clear the contents of the current Output window
Add the current offset to the list of stored positions
Copy the current offset to the Clipboard

Message.description: Option: Adjust selection on Insert operation
Option: Display cursor address on the left
Message.value: Display cursor address on the left

Item.text: You are about to paste a text from the Clipboard. It is STRONGLY recommended to read a corresponding section in an included documentation before performing this operation.
Find All only supports displaying results when the view is in "Hex Bytes" or "Decimal Bytes" mode. Do you want to switch to this mode now?

Message.description: Invalid window selected. Cannot connect to selected window
Message.value: Invalid window selected. Cannot connect to selected window.

Item.text: Pasting Text feature allows you to paste a text from Clipboard and optionally parse it if it contains a sequence of decimal or hexadecimal numbers.

Message.description: Action: Open documentation section and continue

Item.text: Encodings feature allows you to change the character encoding of a text pane of any editor window.

Message.key: Do you want to override this scheme?
Message.description: Do you want to override this scheme?
Currently selected encoding is not supported by your operating system. Make sure the necessary code page files and fonts are installed
Message.value: Currently selected encoding is not supported by your operating system. Make sure the necessary code page files and fonts are installed.

Message.description: Your system lacks the components required to support the selected encoding. Select another encoding.
Message.value: Your system lacks the components required to support the selected encoding. Select another encoding.

Enumeration.description: Action: Switch "Single Selection mode" option on

Item.text: This will effectively turn Multiple Selection off. You can later switch this option back off on General Settings tab.
Multiple Selection feature allows the view to have several selected blocks of data and apply editing commands on all of them.
Find All Occurrences feature quickly finds all occurrences of a pattern in a file (or within selection) and converts them to the selection.

Message.value: Searching for a regular expression within a selection is not supported.
Message.description: Searching for a regular expression within a selection is not supported

Message.value: Searching for a regular expression backwards is not supported.
Message.description: Searching for a regular expression backwards is not supported

Item.text: Replace All Occurrences feature quickly finds all occurrences of a pattern and replaces them with another pattern. Patterns may be of differrent sizes and target pattern may be empty.
Save Selection feature allows you to save the current selection to file.
Load Selection feature allows you to load a selection from file. Loaded selection may optionally be added to the current one, or subtracted from it.

Message.description: Go to Offset window title/message box title
This function is not supported for the current document type
Message.value: This function is not supported for the current document type.

Message.description: Change File Size window title/message box title

Item.text: Connect To feature allows you to connect two windows, binding cursor movements in them.

Message.value: {isfound?}{n} occurrences found.{|isfound}A pattern was not found.{?isfound}
{isfound?}{n} occurrences found and replaced.{|isfound}A pattern was not found.{?isfound}

Item.text: Encrypt/Decrypt feature allows you to encrypt (and decrypt) the selected data, using any of installed stream or block ciphers.
Data Operations feature allows you to perform bitwise, arithmetic, shift, case change and inverse operations on selected data.
Copy Selection Regions feature allows you to copy the list of current selection regions to the Clipboard.
Export Selection Regions feature allows you to export the list of current selection regions to the text file.
ERROR - Key length must be a power of 8.

Message.description: Selected algorithm requires data size to be multiple of N bytes
Message.value: Selected algorithm requires data size to be multiple of {bytes} bytes.
Encryption/decryption failed with an error code {code}

Message.key: Enter number of columns per row:
Message.description: Field: Enter number of columns per row
"Select the Window to Connect" window title

Message.key: Click on the icon below, drag it over the window you want to connect to and release the mouse button.
Message.description: Field: Click on the icon below…

Message.key: Cursor movement is synchornized in connected windows.
Message.description: Field: Cursor movement is synchornized in connected windows
Message.value: Cursor movement is synchronized in connected windows.

Message.key: Please wait while the current operation is being performed…
Message.description: Field: Please wait while the current operation is being performed…

Message.key: You may use mathematic expression to enter new file size. See Help for more details.
Message.description: Field: You may use mathematic expression to enter new file size…

Message.key: Here you can select the default properties of the editor window:
Message.description: Field: Here you can select the default properties of the editor window

Message.key: Autosave editor window settings for each opened document
Message.description: Checkbox: Autosave editor window settings for each opened document

Message.key: When checked, Hex Editor Neo will associate the editor window settings you configure with every opened document. Next time you open the same document in the editor, editor window settings are automatically loaded.
Enter new file pattern regular expression:
Message.description: Field: Enter new file pattern regular expression

Message.value: Such pattern already exists. Do you want to override it?
